long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Sourcing Assistant from SFX now makes it super easy to add and update profiles to your Talent Network. Sourcers and Recruiters can now reach out to the best candidates for their jobs and build lasting brand relationships to enable quick hiring.
